title: Ten Hag's Preseason of Pressure
description:
The FC crew recap Manchester United's opening win over Liverpool in a club friendly and discuss what Ronaldo can provide in Ten Hag's new-look Man United side. Plus, Barcelona finally get deals for Raphinha and Dembele over the line, but will the two superstars be compatible next season? And Stevie and Craig reignite their debate on whether Antonio Conte's preseason training tactics are beneficial.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Ten Hag determined to keep Ronaldo; Raphinha and Dembele complete Barcelona deals; Conte training methods gone too far?
